is_unit_iff_is_unit_val:
theorem is_unit_iff_is_unit_val (f : homogeneous_localization.at_prime ğ’œ ğ”­) : is_unit f.val â†” is_unit f :=
  âŸ¨fun h1 => by
    rcases h1 with âŸ¨âŸ¨a, b, eq0, eq1âŸ©, eq2 : a = f.valâŸ©
    rw [eq2] at eq0 eq1
    clear a eq2
    induction' b using localization.induction_on with data
    rcases data with âŸ¨a, âŸ¨b, hbâŸ©âŸ©
    dsimp only at eq0 eq1
    have b_f_denom_not_mem : b * f.denom âˆˆ ğ”­.prime_compl := fun r =>
      or.elim (ideal.is_prime.mem_or_mem infer_instance r) (fun r2 => hb r2) fun r2 => f.denom_mem r2
    rw [f.eq_num_div_denom, localization.mk_mul,
      show (âŸ¨b, hbâŸ© : ğ”­.prime_compl) * âŸ¨f.denom, _âŸ© = âŸ¨b * f.denom, _âŸ© from rfl,
      show (1 : localization.at_prime ğ”­) = localization.mk 1 1 by erw [localization.mk_self 1], localization.mk_eq_mk',
      is_localization.eq] at eq1
    rcases eq1 with âŸ¨âŸ¨c, hcâŸ©, eq1âŸ©
    simp only [â† subtype.val_eq_coe] at eq1
    change a * f.num * 1 * c = _ at eq1
    simp only [one_mul, mul_one] at eq1
    have mem1 : a * f.num * c âˆˆ ğ”­.prime_compl :=
      eq1.symm â–¸ fun r => or.elim (ideal.is_prime.mem_or_mem infer_instance r) (by tauto) (by tauto)
    have mem2 : f.num âˆ‰ ğ”­ := by
      contrapose! mem1
      erw [not_not]
      exact ideal.mul_mem_right _ _ (ideal.mul_mem_left _ _ mem1)
    refine' âŸ¨âŸ¨f, quotient.mk' âŸ¨f.deg, âŸ¨f.denom, f.denom_mem_degâŸ©, âŸ¨f.num, f.num_mem_degâŸ©, mem2âŸ©, _, _âŸ©, rflâŸ© <;>
          simp only [ext_iff_val, mul_val, val_mk', â† subtype.val_eq_coe, f.eq_num_div_denom, localization.mk_mul,
            one_val] <;>
        convert localization.mk_self _ <;>
      simpa only [mul_comm] ,
    fun âŸ¨âŸ¨_, b, eq1, eq2âŸ©, rflâŸ© =>
    by
    simp only [ext_iff_val, mul_val, one_val] at eq1 eq2
    exact âŸ¨âŸ¨f.val, b.val, eq1, eq2âŸ©, rflâŸ©âŸ©
#align is_unit_iff_is_unit_val is_unit_iff_is_unit_val

@[ext]
theorem ext {c1 c2 : num_denom_same_deg ğ’œ x} (hdeg : c1.deg = c2.deg) (hnum : (c1.num : A) = c2.num)
    (hdenom : (c1.denom : A) = c2.denom) : c1 = c2 :=
  by
  rcases c1 with âŸ¨i1, âŸ¨n1, hn1âŸ©, âŸ¨d1, hd1âŸ©, h1âŸ©
  rcases c2 with âŸ¨i2, âŸ¨n2, hn2âŸ©, âŸ¨d2, hd2âŸ©, h2âŸ©
  dsimp only [subtype.coe_mk] at *
  simp only; exact âŸ¨hdeg, by subst hdeg <;> subst hnum, by subst hdeg <;> subst hdenomâŸ©
#align ext ext
